The U.S. must get back to a doctrine of peace through strength—and today’s sanctions are long past due.

The financial sanctions President Biden announced today are too little and too late. As a result of his inaction to deter Russian aggression, Russia has now further invaded and put our partner Ukraine - and the security of Europe - in grave danger.

Since day 1, President Biden has shown weak leadership on the world stage, gifting Putin the Nord Stream 2 Pipeline and more control over energy supplies in the region and failing to hold Russia accountable for their cyber-attacks.
